de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui.custom.editor
Class AdvancedTextAreaPainter

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui.custom.editor.TextAreaPainter
                  de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui.custom.editor.AdvancedTextAreaPainter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.text.TabExpander
public class AdvancedTextAreaPainter
extends TextAreaPainter

This class inherits TextAreaPainter of the JEditSyntax project and let you draw line numbers in it, support anti aliasing and draw lines invalid as in spell correction.

See Also:
Serialized Form
